tag_list: starter, sysadmin, freelance, code-for-america, spicecorps, mpn
overview:
Co-Founder of WinSitter.com and freelance sysadmin.

Started as a sysadmin in the US Navy in mid-90’s and has worked in many types of IT shops including government (fed and local), consulting, and eventually went freelance to find new challenges. Specializes in a deep Microsoft stack of server and client management, as well as collaboration and communication. Obtained nearly 30 IT certifications.

Supports the community as an active member of: Hampton Roads .NET User Group active on www.serverfault.com Int. Assoc. of Microsoft Channel Partners Microsoft Partner Network SpiceCorps of Hampton Roads Start Norfolk Code for America Brigade
